body.p:
Danville Kenty
Beriah Magoffin Gov of Kenty
Dear Sir
You will find enclosed the petition for the remission of the fines, you told me to forward you when here your earliest attention to the above will greatly Serve the oblige

Yours with most respect
B Bell
